Nightlight:
Nightlight moved abit and smiled. Still she was deeply slept. She 
hadn't noticed that Rodimus had eases her.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus eases Nightlight over a bit and gets up. He didn't want to 
wake her. She was so at peace. Beautifull.
> 
> Rodimus decides to go get cleaned up. Flicker hadn't responded 
back, but Roddy was sure he was needed somewhere.
